data.question: Where to see system logs?
data.answer: You can find these logs in /var/syslog file.

data.question: In systemd systems how can you see the logs after last bootup?
data.answer: You can use this command. journalctl -b

data.question: Where can you see information on what users logged into the system?
data.answer: You can find these infomation in lastlog which is located at /var/lastlog

data.question: How to check the directories which are using most space?
data.answer: You can use this command. du -sch *

data.question: How to see number of files that are opened by OS?
data.answer: You can use this command. lsof| wc -l

data.question: Keep a watch in this section new questions are updated everyday.
